round 58 k1 k2tog repeat 5 times 10 men s round 51 k9 k2tog repeat 5 times 50 round 52 k8 k2tog repeat 5 times 45 round 53 k7 k2tog repeat 5 times 40 round 54 k6 k2tog repeat 5 times 35 round 55 k5 k2tog repeat 5 times 30 round 56 k4 k2tog repeat 5 times 25 round 57 k3 k2tog repeat 5 times 20 round 58 k2 k2tog repeat 5 times 15 round 58 k1 k2tog repeat 5 times 10 finishing break the yarn leaving a long tail to close the crown of the hat with the yarn/tapestry needle working clockwise around from the stitches on the left needle to the stitches on the right needle pick up the 10 9 for child size remaining stitches remove the needles and pull the yarn taut work the yarn to the inside of the hat through the center of the crown secure the yarn on the inside of the hat with a few knots and weave in the end if desired embellish your double brim beanie with a yarn or faux fur pom pom enjoy your cozy chunky parry beanie if you enjoyed this pattern…you may also like other patterns by bonnie may blue available on etsy & ravelry www bonniemayblue etsy com https //www ravelry com/designers/bonniemayblue-ambrea-bishop more patterns to come… follow me on facebook bonniemayblue and instagram
